content: here you will find my version of a crochet hook case since i have hooks from very thin to very thick i wanted to have one in which i can easily adjust the size of the pockets this pattern is written more as a template instead of exact instructions since i figure my hooks and the yarn i used aren t exactly the same as yours enjoy for help with or questions about this pattern you re welcome in the designer s group la visch designs /groups/la-visch-designs
